An Insider’s Look at SharpSpring with Agency Guru Jay Baer

Watch Jay Baer and SharpSpring CEO Rick Carlson sound off on business and tech

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Curious what the experts are saying about SharpSpring?

Buckle up as New York Times best-selling author and agency guru Jay Baer joins SharpSpring CEO Rick Carlson. They get down to business in this exclusive look into the SharpSpring platform. Watch these marketing masters discuss:

  • The future of marketing automation
  • The real deal on improving your bottom line
  • The features you really need

[/vc_column_text]

Your Hosts

Jay Baer

Founder, Convince & Convert (And 4 Other Agencies)

New York Times best-selling author, keynote speaker and co-host of the SocialPros podcast. Jay Baer is an agency guru, founder of Convince & Convert, and the owner of the #1 content blog in the world.

Rick Carlson

Founder & CEO, SharpSpring

Rick started SharpSpring to bring marketing automation to the masses with an affordable, simple platform. He has more than 15 years of executive management experience with several successful internet security companies.
